mapper.update: update comment set cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.cid, a.uid, a.state, a.createtime, a.content,b.realname,c.url from comment a LEFT JOIN studentsinfo b ON a.uid=b.id LEFT JOIN sys_file c ON b.photoid=c.id where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.state=0 ORDER BY a.createtime DESC
select id, cid, uid, state, createtime, content from comment ORDER BY createtime DESC
